title: Fresh mackerel with roasted rhubarb
description: Believe it or not, this is a classic combination. Tart rhubarb cuts through the richness of smoky, oily mackerel for a perfect spring supper.
ingredients: good shake of light brown sugar
a little plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper, for dusting
a couple of good glugs of fruity olive oil
a few sprigs of rosemary, chopped
